entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -20.7°C

Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 80 %

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Ice pellets. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of ice pellets overnight with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Ice pellets. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of ice pellets and risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023
